member.name: TCP_ESTATS_BANDWIDTH_ROD_v0
member.summary: The TCP_ESTATS_BANDWIDTH_ROD_v0 structure contains read-only dynamic information for extended TCP statistics on bandwidth estimation for a TCP connection.

member.name: TCP_ESTATS_BANDWIDTH_ROD_v0.OutboundBandwidth
member.summary: The computed outbound bandwidth estimate, in bits per second, for the network path for the TCP connection.

member.name: TCP_ESTATS_BANDWIDTH_ROD_v0.InboundBandwidth
member.summary: The computed inbound bandwidth estimate, in bits per second, for the network path for the TCP connection.

member.name: TCP_ESTATS_BANDWIDTH_ROD_v0.OutboundInstability
member.summary: A measure, in bits per second, of the instability of the outbound bandwidth estimate for the network path for the TCP connection.

member.name: TCP_ESTATS_BANDWIDTH_ROD_v0.InboundInstability
member.summary: A measure, in bits per second, of the instability of the inbound bandwidth estimate for the network path for the TCP connection.

member.name: TCP_ESTATS_BANDWIDTH_ROD_v0.OutboundBandwidthPeaked
member.summary: A boolean value that indicates if the computed outbound bandwidth estimate for the network path for the TCP connection has reached its peak value.

member.name: TCP_ESTATS_BANDWIDTH_ROD_v0.InboundBandwidthPeaked
member.summary: A boolean value that indicates if the computed inbound bandwidth estimate for the network path for the TCP connection has reached its peak value.
